issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: fs/s3
components.description: S3A filesystem client and other S3 connectivity issues

fields.description:
while doing s3a tests against trunk, one of the S3n tests, {{TestS3NContractRootDir.testRecursiveRootListing}} failed. 

This may be a failure of recursive listing of an empty root directory; it's transient because of deletion inconsistencies means the problem doesn't always surface
